category.name: Active Workspace Search
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: AWC_Limited_Filter_Categories_Expanded
preference.preference_description: Specifies the list of internal names of categories which need to be expanded by default after execution of a search. Only comes into picture if AWC_Limited_Filter_Categories_Enabled preference is set to true Out of the box, no values will be there in this multivalued preference. Categorization.Category and WorkspaceObject.object_type will be always expanded as they are required out of the box.
